N o t e: Holopalaearctic species. In Western Europe, recorded on a very great number of plants belonging to Asclepiadaceae , Asperaceae, Poaceae ,
Rosaceae ( PÉRICART 1998a )
, in

Iran on Cannabis , Cynanchum vincetoxicum ,
Gossypium , Sinapis ( LINNAVUORI 2011 )
.
